name: openbluelineeffect
description: Takes a video and produces the "blue line" effect similar to the TikTok filter.
author: Syeerus

scripts.build: npm run tsc & nexe --verbose --target x64 --input src/index.js --output bin/openblueline
scripts.build-win: npm run tsc & nexe --verbose --target windows-x64 --input bin/index.js --output bin/openblueline
scripts.build-linux: npm run tsc & nexe --verbose --target linux-x64 --input bin/index.js --output bin/openblueline
scripts.build-macos: npm run tsc & nexe --verbose --target macos-x64 --input bin/index.js --output bin/openblueline
